## kcurl add

add name url env to local file

### Synopsis

add name url env to local file then you can use name to request

```
kcurl add [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -e, --env string   env:dev,online (default "dev")
  -h, --help         help for add
  -u, --url string   url
```
